commit.message:
pthread-init-2.c (dg-options): Define _XOPEN_SOURCE=500 on AIX.

        * gcc.dg/pthread-init-2.c (dg-options): Define _XOPEN_SOURCE=500
        on AIX.

From-SVN: r194668

files.patch:

+2012-12-21  David Edelsohn  <dje.gcc@gmail.com>

+	on AIX.
